name: Tunisian
shortDescr: Inspired by the famous North-African city that touches the Mediterranean Sea.
fullDescr: Inspired by the famous North-African city that touches the Mediterranean Sea.

name: Coober Pedy
shortDescr: From the hidden depths of Australia, this pendant embodies the treasure that lies within.
fullDescr: From the hidden depths of Australia, this pendant embodies the treasure that lies within.

name: Barahona
shortDescr: This rare blue larimar comes from the Dominican Republic and is not found anywhere else in the world.
fullDescr: This rare blue larimar comes from the Dominican Republic and is not found anywhere else in the world.

name: Borea et Australis
shortDescr: With precious stones from the northern hemisphere and the southern hemisphere, this pendant makes a striking addition to your collection.
fullDescr: With precious stones from the northern hemisphere and the southern hemisphere, this pendant makes a striking addition to your collection.

name: Iona Cross
shortDescr: A cross pendant bearing rare earth from Nova Scotia and New York.
fullDescr: A cross pendant bearing rare earth from Nova Scotia and New York.  A symbol of transformation through suffering, pointing like a compass to the hidden path.

name: Zambian Jewel
shortDescr: A stunning beauty unearthed from the wilds of Zambia.
fullDescr: A stunning beauty unearthed from the wilds of Zambia.

name: Amano Crest
shortDescr: A long forgotten royal crest from a long forgotten, fantastic land.
fullDescr: A long forgotten royal crest from a long forgotten, fantastic land.

name: Pearl of the Earth
shortDescr: Magnificent rose quartz pendant adorned with pink conch pearls and howlite shards.
fullDescr: Magnificent rose quartz pendant adorned with pink conch pearls and howlite shards.

name: Son Uchi
shortDescr: Japanese-inspired gold necklace.  The name translates loosely to 'Three family houses.'
fullDescr: Japanese-inspired gold necklace.  The name translates loosely to 'Three family houses.'

name: The Grand Cartouche
shortDescr: Our most elite offering.  Extravagance personified.
fullDescr: Our most elite offering.  Extravagance personified.  Fashioned after the ancient Egyptian cartouche.

name: Tyrian Medallion
shortDescr: Deep purples and timeless gold are the theme of this piece.
fullDescr: Deep purples and timeless gold are the theme of this piece.  Tyrian purple was a rare and laborious dying technique in earlier times when purple was a color only afforded by royalty.

name: Star of Andalusia
shortDescr: This gleaming pendant evokes the spirit of southern Spain, Andalusia.
fullDescr: This gleaming pendant evokes the spirit of southern Spain, Andalusia.

name: The Palace Seal
shortDescr: There is a hidden door, deep in the Sahara.  Only one key exists which can open its forgotten halls.
fullDescr: There is a hidden door, deep in the Sahara.  Only one key exists which can open its forgotten halls.

name: Compass of Time
shortDescr: Rose quartz pendant complimented with one-of-a-kind pearls from fabled Lake Biwa in Japan.
fullDescr: Rose quartz pendant complimented with one-of-a-kind pearls from fabled Lake Biwa in Japan.

name: Mason's Guide
shortDescr: Pure, white howlite pendant fashioned after a mason's plumb line.  Let it's point keep your path true.
fullDescr: Pure, white howlite pendant fashioned after a mason's plumb line.  Let it's point keep your path true.

name: Fragment of Antiquity
shortDescr: A polished sliver of marble from ancient Mediterranean statue ruins.
fullDescr: A polished sliver of marble from ancient Mediterranean statue ruins.

name: Kyoto Kika
shortDescr: Eye-catching geometric pendant hung from silver chain strung with howlite, rose quartz and Biwa pearls.
fullDescr: Eye-catching geometric pendant hung from silver chain strung with howlite, rose quartz and Biwa pearls.

name: Lilac Throne
shortDescr: Massive chunks of sapphire gilded with silver and gold.  Can be worn as a necklace, but intended to be a show piece.
fullDescr: Massive chunks of sapphire gilded with silver and gold.  Can be worn as a necklace, but intended to be a show piece.

name: Royal Chain
shortDescr: This elegant piece is studded with sapphires and diamonds crowned with a singular, radiant ruby.
fullDescr: This elegant piece is studded with sapphires and diamonds crowned with a singular, radiant ruby.

name: Lost Oasis
shortDescr: Like a gleaming pool of fresh water in a barren desert, this bracelet showcases many deep sapphires joined with diamonds.
fullDescr: Like a gleaming pool of fresh water in a barren desert, this bracelet showcases many deep sapphires joined with diamonds.

name: Scarab of the SouthWest
shortDescr: A perfect union of ancient Native American and North African designs.
fullDescr: A perfect union of ancient Native American and North African designs.

name: Shiva's Bond
shortDescr: Be adorned with the ice-cold colors of a desolate glacier with this dainty bracelet.
fullDescr: Be adorned with the ice-cold colors of a desolate glacier with this dainty bracelet.

name: Torq of the Goddess
shortDescr: This design is based off of the ancient torq necklaces that druids of lore once wore.
fullDescr: This design is based off of the ancient torq necklaces that druids of lore once wore.

name: Spring Melt
shortDescr: As the ice from winter melts away and makes way for gentle spring, lovely colors will begin to emerge.
fullDescr: As the ice from winter melts away and makes way for gentle spring, lovely colors will begin to emerge.

name: Lioness of the East
shortDescr: This indulgent cuff holds fast the treasures of Eastern Leonine royalty.
fullDescr: This indulgent cuff holds fast the treasures of Eastern Leonine royalty.

name: Cartographer's Promise
shortDescr: Ropes of gold join a humble lapis stone framed with two diamonds.
fullDescr: Ropes of gold join a humble lapis stone framed with two diamonds.  This was once the promise given to the lover of a famous 16th century sailor and cartographer.

name: High Honor of the Diné
shortDescr: A SouthWestern motif cuff that represents honorable aspects from Native American culture.
fullDescr: A SouthWestern motif cuff that represents honorable aspects from Native American culture.

name: The Scrying Eye
shortDescr: Looking over the murky ice that encases a forgotten lake in the vast wilderness, one might be able to fortell the future.
fullDescr: Looking over the murky ice that encases a forgotten lake in the vast wilderness, one might be able to fortell the future.

name: Oath of Innocence
shortDescr: The time before heartbreak was the time of our innocence.
fullDescr: The time before heartbreak was the time of our innocence.

name: Silken Silver
shortDescr: In long lost legends from forgotten cultures, it is said rope made of silver silk binds the universe together.
fullDescr: In long lost legends from forgotten cultures, it is said rope made of silver silk binds the universe together.

name: The Emperor
shortDescr: The emperor represents the astrological sign of Aries.
fullDescr: The emperor represents the astrological sign of Aries.

name: The Heirophant
shortDescr: The heirophant represents the astrological sign of Taurus.
fullDescr: The heirophant represents the astrological sign of Taurus.

name: The Lovers
shortDescr: The lovers represents the astrological sign of Gemini.
fullDescr: The lovers represents the astrological sign of Gemini.

name: The Chariot
shortDescr: The chariot represents the astrological sign of Cancer.
fullDescr: The chariot represents the astrological sign of Cancer.

name: Strength
shortDescr: Strength represents the astrological sign of Leo.
fullDescr: Strength represents the astrological sign of Leo.

name: The Hermit
shortDescr: The hermit represents the astrological sign of Virgo.
fullDescr: The hermit represents the astrological sign of Virgo.

name: Justice
shortDescr: Justice represents the astrological sign of Libra.
fullDescr: Justice represents the astrological sign of Libra.

name: Death
shortDescr: Death represents the astrological sign of Scorpio.
fullDescr: Death represents the astrological sign of Scorpio.

name: Temperance
shortDescr: Temperance represents the astrological sign of Saggitarius.
fullDescr: Temperance represents the astrological sign of Saggitarius.

name: The Devil
shortDescr: The devil represents the astrological sign of Capricorn.
fullDescr: The devil represents the astrological sign of Capricorn.

name: The Tower
shortDescr: Misfortune arrives unannounced and, most often, unexpected.  Sometimes a tower must fall for a better one to be built.
fullDescr: Misfortune arrives unannounced and, most often, unexpected.  Sometimes a tower must fall for a better one to be built.

name: The Star
shortDescr: The star represents the astrological sign of Aquarius.
fullDescr: The star represents the astrological sign of Aquarius.

name: The Moon
shortDescr: The moon represents the astrological sign of Pisces.
fullDescr: The moon represents the astrological sign of Pisces.

name: The Sun
shortDescr: The sun brings grand illumination of the mind and sincere joy to the soul.
fullDescr: The sun brings grand illumination of the mind and sincere joy to the soul.

name: Judgement
shortDescr: The Archangel St. Michael awakens the spirit within to rise from your tomb and pursue your true calling.
fullDescr: The Archangel St. Michael awakens the spirit within to rise from your tomb and pursue your true calling.  This charm empowers those who wear it to go beyond their comfort zone and seek new opportunities.

name: The World
shortDescr: A complete cycle.  The end of something old and the beginning of something new.
fullDescr: A complete cycle.  The end of something old and the beginning of something new.

name: The Watchtower
shortDescr: The column of light that breaks through the storm.  Hope lies on the shoreline and beyond the solitary beacon.
fullDescr: The column of light that breaks through the storm.  Hope lies on the shoreline and beyond the solitary beacon.
